items.title: The creator economy’s ad revenue problem and India’s AI ambitions
items.creator: Theresa Loconsolo
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: The creator economy’s ad revenue problem and India’s AI ambitions
items.content: The creator economy is evolving fast, and ad revenue alone isn’t cutting it anymore. YouTubers are launching product lines, acquiring startups, and building actual business empires. In fact, MrBeast’s company bought fintech startup Step, and his chocolate business is outearning his media arm. This isn’t just one creator’s strategy. For many, it’s the new playbook.  On this episode of TechCrunch’s Equity podcast, hosts Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, and Rebecca Bellan unpack how creators are diversifying beyond ads, […]

items.translated_title: Anthropic-funded group backs candidate attacked by rival AI super PAC
items.content: Dueling pro-AI PACs have centered around backing or targeting one New York congressional bid: Alex Bores, whose RAISE Act requires AI developers to disclose safety protocols and report serious system misuse.

items.translated_title: Apple’s iOS 26.4 arrives in public beta with AI music playlists, video podcasts, and more
items.content: Several updates are introduced in iOS 26.4, including an AI-powered playlist-generation feature in Apple Music, support for video content in the Podcasts app, end-to-end encryption (E2EE) for RCS messages, and more.

items.content: A Ukrainian man has been sentenced for helping North Koreans gain fraudulent employment at dozens of U.S. companies and funnel that money back to the regime to fund its nuclear weapons program.

items.translated_title: AI’s promise to indie filmmakers: Faster, cheaper, lonelier
items.content: AI expands access to filmmaking for resource-constrained creators. But as efficiency becomes the industry’s north star, creativity risks being overwhelmed by a deluge of low-effort, AI-generated content.

items.translated_title: OpenAI says 18- to 24-year-olds account for nearly 50% of ChatGPT usage in India
items.content: The company said on Friday that users between 18 and 24 years of age account for nearly 50% of all messages sent by Indians to ChatGPT, and users under 30 account for 80% of usage in the country.

items.title: The OpenAI mafia: 18 startups founded by alumni
items.creator: Charles Rollet, Dominic-Madori Davis
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: The OpenAI mafia: 18 startups founded by alumni
items.content: Many employees have come and gone since OpenAI first launched a decade ago, and some have launched startups of their own. Among these, some have become top rivals (like Anthropic), while others, just on investor interest alone, have managed to raise billions without even launching a product.
